entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 07:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: NW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 26 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
